content.text: Hey there! I'm a potter and I also enjoy photographing my everyday life.
Hi there! I'm also a potter and I love playing with my dogs!
What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a dachshund named Daisy and a terrier mix named Oliver.
Aww, they sound cute! I have two cats named Charlie and Max.
Cats are great too! I'm sorry about your cat that passed away last year.
Thanks. It was hard, but I'm glad I got to spend so much time with him.
I'm sure you did. What's your favorite thing to photograph?
I like photographing my kids and my pottery. I also like taking pictures of nature.
I love taking pictures of nature too. It's so peaceful and beautiful.
It is! I love hiking and biking, so I get to take a lot of pictures of nature when I'm out and about.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'd love to get into hiking and biking.
It's a great way to get outside and enjoy nature. It's also a good way to get some exercise.
Yeah, I need to get more exercise. I'm always so busy with work and school.
I know the feeling. I'm a single mom, so I have to juggle a lot of things.
I'm impressed! You seem like you're doing a great job.
Thanks! It's not always easy, but I'm trying my best.
I'm sure your kids are lucky to have you.
